name: Kumitantei: Old-School Slaughter
storyline: Meet a colourful ensemble cast of sixteen elite students as they find themselves caught in a deadly Apathy Experiment, where their very humanity is put to the Absolute test! Trapped in a decrepit Bunker, will solving the mysteries of its past and present lead them to means of escaping alive?
summary:
Kumitantei: Old-School Slaughter is a tribute to retro anime and pop culture of 1980's Japan, underlined with a dark twist of horror and conspiracy!
Primarily inspired by Rumiko Takahashi and the classic Japanese adventure game genre, blended seamlessly with intricate deck-building and tense mystery solving akin to modern classics!
